data.message: can't believe people thinks this is bad music? This is a really great song with amazing vocals from beyonce and dont get me started about em's verses really pure and honest from the heart.

replies.message: He left a easter egg if u know what im saying at the last verse of the song 😂, so i think the album will rock, the song its too good if u listen to the lyrics and not to the beat like all fags do in these days 🙄
I thought it was beautiful. It reminds us that he's human, who struggles with trying to find perfection in his work. I think the more serious fans also realize the beautiful depth to the song.
Stancu Alin The easter egg at the end promises!
Jessy Hoffman the ending made the whole song. I'm too hyped for the album
Really you are saying that it's a good song? Only Beyonce is singing with Em? For me, it's like any song "oh, ok... it's good.. next one"
Stancu Alin it's not about lyrics anymore. It's about a hot beat and a catchy hook
Thought I was the only one who got hyped by that easter egg

Nate Kloos It should not be like that, i’m talkin bout the rap industry. It should be about the story that the lyrics are transmitting to the listener. So i don’t think its all about the “Dope” beats and the Hooks .. It’s just my opinion.
Stancu Alin ya I get it I was just quoting a line from one of his songs

People are so fucking dumb... People ask for real rappers instead of uzi vert, lil yachty, kodak black, 21 savage, they finally get some good lyricists like indeed Eminem, but furthermore J. Cole, Kendrick etc, finally some good music for hiphop since a long time, and people still hate and talk shit... If you cant be happy with it just stop it and listen to other music or something, those bullshit comments... come on give the man his probs.. he is the best rapper alive and deserved, he is far more lyrical better than most rapper that became idolized by society.. Come on..
It was awesome.... if you take shitty Beyoncé out of it.
Talking about raping your mother is far from the heart. That's a fucked up ❤️
The issue is that the hook is the best part of the song. That's the entire point.
Bullshit, everything was fine... nothing wrong with it...
Jessy Hoffman yes it does 😀🐰
bullshit
it is  crap
Trash

Beyoncé sounded awful in this song eminems part was alright but the song wasnt even catchy at all not even close to songs like stan and love the way you lie or even monster it just wasn't a good mix Beyoncé and Eminem don't mix
I can not believe you think this is good?
This is not eminem. This is recovery eminem, which is trash.
I thought the same
The guy is dope, forget the haters they are jealous 😒

It sounds so great when you can hear all the sound with a good sound system. However the SNL version with the band playing was even better. All those instruments brings the sound to life even more. It's a great song!
